items.fromString:
*Overview / Scope*

* Search for contact in the system. If the contact exists, use this contact record. (done via look up)
* Enter contact details if no contact found, then add new contact.
** Quick Create to capture new applicant contact details
* Existing fields to capture details
* Using existing contact entity

----

*User Story*

*As an* APHA Caseworker
*I want to* add applicant contact to offline applications
*So that* Contact details against the record are recorded

----

*Acceptance Criteria*

+*AC1: Add existing contact to offline application record*+
*Given* I have created a new offline application
*And* I click on the look up
*When* I search and find an existing contact
*Then* I can add the existing contact to the Offline record



+*AC2: Add new contact record to offline application record*+
*Given* I have created a new offline application
*And* I click on the look up 
*And* I cannot find an existing contact
*When* I click on the + New button (via the look up)
*Then* a quick create view appears
*And* I can add the new contact details



+*AC3: Removal of Applicant Details from the form*+
*Given* I have created a new offline application
*When* I look at the form
*Then* I cannot see the Applicant Details section
*And* associated logic to auto populate the owner fields are removed

----

{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Task Checklist*

* Remove offline applicant section and fields from the form
* Create a new quick create form
* Create new field on contact entity to say this is offline
* JS on create to populate the offline fields (JS to sit on quick create form only)
* Security role updated for all users
* Remove logic around populate owner fields based on applicant.
* Update mandatory fields for authorised
* Update data dictionary
* UI test updates
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#eae6ff}
*Technical Notes*

*  
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#fffae6}
*General*

*  
{panel}

resolution.name: Done

content.text: Authorised Travellers are people who are allowed to travel with a cat, dog or ferret to NI on a different person’s authorised PTD, on the assumption that they’ve agreed to the relevant ts and cs. There needs to be a way to capture and store authorised traveller information against a PTD, and as a separate entity that can be suspended if they’re deemed to have broken the terms of service. However, the portal does not have capacity to create the forms for this, so alternatives are being looked into.
One of the solutions proposed by the content design team is to use

forms. These allow for easy creation and management of forms, with any submitted information sent to an email address for further processing. The challenge is in figuring out how the information can get from the email and into Dynamics in a robust and manageable way.
This spike has been raised to look at options how to receive authorised traveller information into Dynamics. The following should be considered:
methods to extract data from emails and submit in Dynamics
other form tools to allow data capture, with a defined method to submit the data to Dynamics
manual processes - we may need to understand expected numbers before we consider any manual process options

----

*User Story*

*As an* APHA Caseworker
*I want to* select the breed and colour for a given species
*So that* I can ensure the right details are recorded

----

*Acceptance Criteria*

+*AC1: See breed and colour for Dog when Dog is selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select Dog for Species from the drop down menu
*Then* I can select the associated dog breed from the drop down menu
*And* I can select the dog colour from the drop down menu
*And* I cannot see the associated free text fields to enter pet colour or breed



+*AC2: See breed and colour when Cat is selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select Cat for Species from the drop down menu
*Then* I can select the associated cat breed from the drop down menu
*And* I can select the cat colour from the drop down menu
*And* I cannot see the associated free text fields to enter pet colour or breed



+*AC3: See colour when Ferret is selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select ferret for Species from the drop down menu
*Then* I can select the ferret colour from the drop down menu
*And* the breed field is hidden
*And* I cannot see the free text field to enter pet colour



+*AC4: Surface Other colour free text box when Other selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select Other in colour for any species from the colour drop down menu
*Then* the existing Other colour free text field will appear



+*AC5: Surface Additional Breed Details free text box when Mixed breed selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select Mixed breed in the breed drop down for either dog or cat species
*Then* the existing Additional Breed Details free text field will appear

----

{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Task Checklist*

* Create new entities
* Make “breed id” and “colour id” alternate keys
* Create lookup fields on PTD application 
* Make field visible for offline applications
* Hide the online application fields
* Populate the online field with offline values (flow) _- ensure consistency in approach to populating online fields across tickets_
* Additional logic
** Filter breed and colour based on pet type (JS)
** If unknown/Mixed breed options chosen, show related free text field (Additional Breed)
** Hide Breed field where Ferret is selected as the species.
* Update security role for new entities as per [https://eaflood.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/4562714764/Defra - NIPTS - Security Role Configuration.xlsx?api=v2|https://eaflood.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/4562714764/Defra%20-%20NIPTS%20-%20Security%20Role%20Configuration.xlsx?api=v2]
* Update mandatory field logic with new fields
* Update data dictionary
* Update UI tests
{panel}

*User Story*

*As an* APHA Caseworker
*I want to* select the breed and colour for a given species
*So that* I can ensure the right details are recorded

----

*Acceptance Criteria*

+*AC1: See breed and colour for Dog when Dog is selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select Dog for Species from the drop down menu
*Then* I can select the associated dog breed from the drop down menu
*And* I can select the dog colour from the drop down menu
*And* I cannot see the associated free text fields to enter pet colour or breed



+*AC2: See breed and colour when Cat is selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select Cat for Species from the drop down menu
*Then* I can select the associated cat breed from the drop down menu
*And* I can select the cat colour from the drop down menu
*And* I cannot see the associated free text fields to enter pet colour or breed



+*AC3: See colour when Ferret is selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select ferret for Species from the drop down menu
*Then* I can select the ferret colour from the drop down menu
*And* the breed field is hidden
*And* I cannot see the free text field to enter pet colour



+*AC4: Surface Other colour free text box when Other selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select Other in colour for any species from the colour drop down menu
*Then* the existing Other colour free text field will appear



+*AC5: Surface Additional Breed Details free text box when Mixed breed selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select Mixed breed in the breed drop down for either dog or cat species
*Then* the existing Additional Breed Details free text field will appear

----

{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Task Checklist*

* Create new entities
* Make “breed id” and “colour id” alternate keys
* Create lookup fields on PTD application 
* Make field visible for offline applications
* Hide the online application fields
* Populate the online field with offline values (flow) _- ensure consistency in approach to populating online fields across tickets_
* Additional logic
** Filter breed and colour based on pet type (JS)
** If unknown/Mixed breed options chosen, show related free text field (Additional Breed)
** Hide Breed field where Ferret is selected as the species.
* Update security role for new entities as per [https://eaflood.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/4562714764/Defra - NIPTS - Security Role Configuration.xlsx?api=v2|https://eaflood.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/4562714764/Defra%20-%20NIPTS%20-%20Security%20Role%20Configuration.xlsx?api=v2]
* Update mandatory field logic with new fields
* Update data dictionary
* Update UI tests
{panel}

*User Story*

*As an* APHA Caseworker
*I want to* select the breed and colour for a given species
*So that* I can ensure the right details are recorded

----

*Acceptance Criteria*

+*AC1: See breed and colour for Dog when Dog is selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select Dog for Species from the drop down menu
*Then* I can select the associated dog breed from the drop down menu
*And* I can select the dog colour from the drop down menu
*And* I cannot see the associated free text fields to enter pet colour or breed



+*AC2: See breed and colour when Cat is selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select Cat for Species from the drop down menu
*Then* I can select the associated cat breed from the drop down menu
*And* I can select the cat colour from the drop down menu
*And* I cannot see the associated free text fields to enter pet colour or breed



+*AC3: See colour when Ferret is selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select ferret for Species from the drop down menu
*Then* I can select the ferret colour from the drop down menu
*And* I cannot see the free text field to enter pet colour



+*AC4: Surface Other colour free text box when Other selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select Other in colour for any species from the colour drop down menu
*Then* the existing Other colour free text field will appear



+*AC5: Surface Additional Breed Details free text box when Mixed breed selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select Mixed breed in the breed drop down for either dog or cat species
*Then* the existing Additional Breed Details free text field will appear

----

{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Task Checklist*

* Create new entities
* Make “breed id” and “colour id” alternate keys
* Create lookup fields on PTD application 
* Make field visible for offline applications
* Hide the online application fields
* Populate the online field with offline values (flow)
* Additional logic
** Filter breed and colour based on pet type (JS)
** If unknown/Mixed breed options chosen, show related free text field (Additional Breed)
* Update mandatory field logic with new fields
* Update data dictionary
* Update UI tests
{panel}

*User Story*

*As an* APHA Caseworker
*I want to* select the breed and colour for a given species
*So that* I can ensure the right details are recorded

----

*Acceptance Criteria*

+*AC1: See breed and colour for Dog when Dog is selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select Dog for Species from the drop down menu
*Then* I can select the associated dog breed from the drop down menu
*And* I can select the dog colour from the drop down menu
*And* I cannot see the associated free text fields to enter pet colour or breed



+*AC2: See breed and colour when Cat is selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select Cat for Species from the drop down menu
*Then* I can select the associated cat breed from the drop down menu
*And* I can select the cat colour from the drop down menu
*And* I cannot see the associated free text fields to enter pet colour or breed



+*AC3: See colour when Ferret is selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select ferret for Species from the drop down menu
*Then* I can select the ferret colour from the drop down menu
*And* I cannot see the free text field to enter pet colour



+*AC4: Surface Other colour free text box when Other selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select Other in colour for any species from the colour drop down menu
*Then* the existing Other colour free text field will appear



+*AC5: Surface Additional Breed Details free text box when Mixed breed selected*+
*Given* I am on the Offline PTD Application form
*When* I select Mixed breed in the breed drop down for either dog or cat species
*Then* the existing Additional Breed Details free text field will appear

----

{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Task Checklist*

* Create new entities
* Make “breed id” and “colour id” alternate keys
* Create lookup fields on PTD application 
* Make field visible for offline applications
* Hide the online application fields
* Populate the online field with offline values (flow)
* Additional logic
** Filter breed and colour based on pet type (JS)
** If unknown/Mixed breed options chosen, show related free text field (Additional Breed)
* Update mandatory field logic with new fields
* Update data dictionary
* Update UI tests
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#eae6ff}
*Technical Notes*

*  
{panel}

*General*

*  
{panel}

content.text: Each species has its own list of breed and colour. This needs to be reflected in IDCOMS
NB - Welsh IDs from portal are out of scope for this ticket.
New entity - Pet Breed with the following field specification
select the breed and colour for a given species
I can ensure the right details are recorded
AC1: See breed and colour for Dog when Dog is selected
I am on the Offline PTD Application form
I select Dog for Species from the drop down menu
I can select the associated dog breed from the drop down menu
I can select the dog colour from the drop down menu
I cannot see the associated free text fields to enter pet colour or breed
AC2: See breed and colour when Cat is selected
I am on the Offline PTD Application form
I select Cat for Species from the drop down menu
I can select the associated cat breed from the drop down menu
I can select the cat colour from the drop down menu
I cannot see the associated free text fields to enter pet colour or breed
AC3: See colour when Ferret is selected
I am on the Offline PTD Application form
I select ferret for Species from the drop down menu
I can select the ferret colour from the drop down menu
I cannot see the free text field to enter pet colour
AC4: Surface Other colour free text box when Other selected
I am on the Offline PTD Application form
I select Other in colour for any species from the colour drop down menu
the existing Other colour free text field will appear
AC5: Surface Additional Breed Details free text box when Mixed breed selected
I am on the Offline PTD Application form
I select Mixed breed in the breed drop down for either dog or cat species
the existing Additional Breed Details free text field will appear
Make “breed id” and “colour id” alternate keys
Create lookup fields on PTD application
Make field visible for offline applications
Populate the online field with offline values (flow)
- ensure consistency in approach to populating online fields across tickets
Filter breed and colour based on pet type (JS)
If unknown/Mixed breed options chosen, show related free text field (Additional Breed)
Hide Breed field where Ferret is selected as the species.
Update security role for new entities as per
Update mandatory field logic with new fields

items.fromString:
+*Overview / Scope of Story*+

* Static content that requires updating is as follows:

* NB - URL needs to be on the same line of the sentence.
* Changes to be made on all automated emails i.e:

*Confirmation* email as indicated in the screenshot (Updates to be made as shown in pink):

!image-20240802-144558.png|width=409,height=482,alt="image-20240802-144558.png"!



*Approved* email as indicated in the screenshot (Updates to be made as shown in pink):

!image-20240802-144726.png|width=366,height=495,alt="image-20240802-144726.png"!



*Rejected* email as indicated in the screenshot (Updates to be made as shown in pink):

!image-20240802-144807.png|width=405,height=425,alt="image-20240802-144807.png"!



*Revoked* email as indicated in the screenshot (Updates to be made as shown in pink):

!image-20240802-144858.png|width=414,height=475,alt="image-20240802-144858.png"!



*Please Note: Highlighted text in pink indicates where the changes are to be made. Please do not keep the text highlighted in pink.*

----

+*User Story*+

*As an* APHA caseworker
*I want to* send updated content in the emails
*So that* the applicant is communicated with the same content throughout the service

----

+*Acceptance Criteria*+

+*AC1: Send updated confirmation Email*+
*Given* the applicant has submitted their online application
*When* the case has been created in IDCOMS
*Then* I want to send the updated confirmation email to be sent to the applicant as per the attached [Confirmation Email|https://eaflood.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/4562714764/Confirmation%20Email.docx?version=7&modificationDate=1721395419195&cacheVersion=1&api=v2] (without pink highlights and URL to be on the same line, not new line).

!image-20240802-144613.png|width=409,height=482,alt="image-20240802-144613.png"!



+*AC2: Send updated approved Email*+
*Given* I have completed processing a PTD Case
*When* I have completed the final action to approve and save the case
*Then* I want to send the updated approved email to the applicant of their outcome as per the attached [Approved Email|https://eaflood.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/4562714764/Approved%20Email.docx?version=9&modificationDate=1721395395258&cacheVersion=1&api=v2] (without pink highlights and URL to be on the same line, not new line).

!image-20240802-144707.png|width=366,height=495,alt="image-20240802-144707.png"!



+*AC3: Send updated rejection Email*+
*Given* I have completed processing a PTD Case
*When* I have completed the final action to reject the case
*Then* I want to send the updated rejection email to the applicant of their outcome as per the attached [Reject Email|https://eaflood.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/4562714764/Rejected%20Email.docx?version=8&modificationDate=1721395409451&cacheVersion=1&api=v2] (without pink highlights and URL to be on the same line, not new line).

!image-20240802-144823.png|width=405,height=425,alt="image-20240802-144823.png"!



+*AC4: Send updated revoke Email*+
*Given* I have completed processing a revocation of a previously approved PTD
*When* I have completed the final action to revoke the case
*Then* I want to send the updated revoked email to the applicant of their outcome as per the attached [Revoked Email|https://eaflood.atlassian.net/wiki/download/attachments/4562714764/Revoked%20Email.docx?version=7&modificationDate=1721395402886&cacheVersion=1&api=v2] (without pink highlights and URL to be on the same line, not new line).

!image-20240802-144911.png|width=414,height=475,alt="image-20240802-144911.png"!



----

{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Task Checklist*

* Update email content
{panel}

items.fromString:
*Overview / Scope*

* Update the message shown below for Date of Birth to the following: "The date for Date of Birth must be in the past.“
* Update the message shown below for Microchip Date to the following: "The date for Microchip must be in the past.“
* Current message example:

!image-20240726-155830.png|width=849,height=410,alt="image-20240726-155830.png"!

----

*User Story*

*As an* APHA Caseworker
*I want to* to see an updated error message
*So that* it is clear to understand the corrections to make

----

*Acceptance Criteria*

+*AC1: Update Date of Birth error message*+
*Given* I have created a new Offline Application
*When* I enter today’s date or date in the future
*Then* the error message displayed should say "The date for Date of Birth must be in the past.“



+*AC2: Update Microchipped Date error message*+
*Given* I have created a new Offline Application
*When* I enter today’s date or date in the future
*Then* the error message displayed should say "The date for Microchip must be in the past.“

----

{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*Task Checklist*

* Update error messages as defined above
{panel}

items.toString:
Direct project references on these projects won't work. They reference the same shared projects which will result in duplicate types when they're both referenced by another assembly (unit tests in this case).

The plug-in assembly projects will need to handle an additional {{Configuration}} value of {{UnitTest}}. In this configuration, they will target the Container.csproj. In {{Debug}} or {{Release}} they will have a project reference to the shared projects.

Example can be seen in Plants:
[https://dev.azure.com/defradev/DEFRA-TRADE/_git/trade.plants?path=/src/solutions/DEFRA_Trade_Plants_Active/pluginassemblies/Defra.Trade.Plants/Defra.Trade.Plants.csproj|https://dev.azure.com/defradev/DEFRA-TRADE/_git/trade.plants?path=/src/solutions/DEFRA_Trade_Plants_Active/pluginassemblies/Defra.Trade.Plants/Defra.Trade.Plants.csproj]{color:#ffffff} {color}
[https://dev.azure.com/defradev/DEFRA-TRADE/_git/trade.plants?path=/tests/Defra.Trade.Plants.UnitTests/Defra.Trade.Plants.UnitTests.csproj|https://dev.azure.com/defradev/DEFRA-TRADE/_git/trade.plants?path=/tests/Defra.Trade.Plants.UnitTests/Defra.Trade.Plants.UnitTests.csproj]

content.text: The “flip-feature-flags-jobs.yml” file has a job “FlipFeatureFlags” whose condition is a combination of checking if the previous job succeeded and running any conditions passed through via the parameters. This should be adjusted to just take the parameter conditions, and the requirement for the previous job having succeeded should be moved into the location where the job is called. This allows for greater flexibility of use for the job.

Eg there is a “succeeded()” part to the conditions within the feature flag jobs yaml file - this should be added to the condition parameter that is sent in to the job, and removed from the job itself.
